roleset.name: molecular event of producing genetic product called protein

example.text: Alternative splicing of exon 4 results in a transcription being translated into a truncated C-terminal protein containing the first, second, and third transmembrane domains, while splicing of exons 3 and 4 would produce a protein with five membrane domains but without the third and fourth domains present in the ET-AR protein.
example.arg: a truncated C-terminal protein containing the first, second, and third transmembrane domains

example.text: ISGF3 gamma has been shown to translated into vitro from recombinant clones bound to DNA with an indistinguishable specificity of ISGF3 gamma purified from HeLa cells.
ISGF3 swab, which has been adequately translated into vitro of A1 clones (recombinant), binds DNA with an indistinguishable specificity of ISGF3 swab, purified from HeLa cells.
Stat1 Y701F which probably translated into vitro can also be dimerized into the LMP2 gas.
Stat1, Stat1 Y701F, Stat1 N135, Stat1 N200 and Stat5/1 that can be translated into vitro are partially purified in heparin-agarose.
example.arg: Stat1, Stat1 Y701F, Stat1 N135, Stat1 N200 and Stat5/1

example.text: The ArC/XylS family of positive prokaryotic transcriptional regulators includes more than 100 proteins and polypeptides that have the ability to be translated from open led frames.
We also report the first definitive incorporation of Sec into a selenoprotein that can be successfully translated into reticulocyte forms.

this mutant can be translated efficiently in the presence of C-terminal SBP2, and as shown in Figure 6C no reader can be detected when the AUGA element is removed, indicating that the stimulatory effect is totally dependent on 3 UTR.
ISGF3 gamma that are translated into vitro are partially purified in heparin-agarose.
ISGF3 gamma that has been translated into vitro can also dimer in the SGL2 of LMP2.

ISGF3 gamma will be translated efficiently in the presence of C-terminal SBP, and as shown in Figure 6C no reader can be detected when the AUGA element is removed, indicating that the stimulatory effect is completely 3 UTR dependent.
ISGF3 gum that can be correctly translated into vitro are partially purified in heparin-astroosis.
ISGF3 gum, as our data reveal, is observed to translated into vitro and purify in part into heparin-acrose.
ISGF3 snake may have been translated into vitro and partially purified into heparin-agarose.
ISGF3 swab that have been translated adequately into vitro are partially purified in heparin-agarose.
ISGF3 swab that have the ability to be translated into vitro are partially purified in heparin-agarose.

More than 100 proteins and polypeptides that are included in the ArC/XylS family of prokaryotic positive transcriptional regulators have the ability to be translated completely from ISGF3 gamma.

Stat1 Y701F has the ability to be translated into vitro and partially purified into heparin-agarose.

Stat1 Y701F, as our data show, are able to be translated into vitro and partially purified into heparin-agarose.
Stat1 Y701F, as our data show, are likely to be translated into vitro and partially purified into heparin-agarose.
Stat1 Y701F, which will be translated appropriately into vitro of A1 clones (recombinant) bind the DNA with an indistinguishable specificity of ISGF3 gum, purified from HeLa cells.

example.text: Stat1, Stat1 Y701F, Stat1 N135, Stat1 N200 and Stat5/1, as revealed by our study, has been shown to translated into the presence of C-terminal SBP2, and as shown in Figure 6C no reader can be detected when the AUGA element is removed, indicating that the stimulatory effect is fully dependent on 3 UTR.

example.text: The ArC/XylS family of prokaryotic positive transcription regulators includes more than 100 proteins and polypeptides observed to be translated from This mutant.
The ArC/XylS family of prokaryotic positive transcriptional regulators includes more than 100 proteins and polypeptides translated from open leing frames.
The ISGF3 gum, as our data show, may have been translated into vitro and partially purified into heparin-astrose.
We also report the first definitive incorporation of Sec into ISGF3 gum which has been shown to be successfully translated into vitro.
We also report the first definitive incorporation of Sec into Stat1 Y701F that proved to be translated into vitro.
We also report the first definitive incorporation of Sec into Stat1, Stat1 Y701F, Stat1 N135, Stat1 N200 and Stat5/1 that can be translated into vitro.
example.arg: Stat1, Stat1 Y701F, Stat1 N135, Stat1 N200 and Stat5/1

example.text: We also report the first definitive incorporation of Sec into Stat1, Stat1 Y701F, Stat1 N135, Stat1 N200 and Stat5/1 that could have been translated into vitro.

example.text: We also report the first definitive incorporation of Sec into selenoprotein that translated into lysed by reticulocytes.
a selenoprotein , as our data reveal, is observed to translated into reticulocyte shading and to partially purify into heparin-acrose.
a selenoprotein that can be translated adequately into with shading of reticulocytes are partially purified in heparin-agarose.
a selenoprotein that has been shown to probably translated into reticulocyte cells can also be dimerized into the LMP2 gas.
a selenoprotein which translated to reticulocyte shales can also be dimerized into the LMP2 gas.
a selenoprotein, as our data show, has the ability to be translated to with shading of reticulocytes and partially purified to heparin-astrose.

open frames, as revealed in our study, has been shown to be translated into the presence of C-terminal SBP, and as shown in Figure 6C, reading the AUGA element is not detectable, indicating that the stimulatory effect is totally 3 UTR dependent.

selenoprotein has the ability to be translated into reticulocyte forms and partially purified into heparin-agarose.
